product_overview: CODIA Platform Tracker is a real-time visual dashboard designed to track development progress of the CODIA platform across multiple weeks. It integrates real-time updates, interactive task management, and detailed dependency visualization to streamline project tracking and reporting for teams.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive, real-time overview of project progress across all phases.
Enable detailed task management including dependencies, blockers, status updates, and notes.
Visualize workflow dependencies and project timelines with multiple views such as Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and network maps.
Support seamless collaboration through real-time activity logs and status syncs.
Offer a responsive, visually appealing UI that works across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
key_features: Master Map: Visual network representation of all tasks and their dependencies, providing a comprehensive project overview.
Gantt Chart Pro: Professional-grade Gantt chart with zoom (50%-300%), dependency arrows, drag-and-drop and resize tasks, and detailed tooltips and modals.
Kanban Board: Drag-and-drop interface to update task statuses, showing blocker counts dynamically.
Workflow Dashboard: Displays task statuses and dependencies with blocker calculations.
GAP Dashboard: Highlights next executable tasks by analyzing blocking dependencies.
Timeline View: Chronological visualization of tasks and milestones for time-oriented tracking.
Activity Logs: Real-time feed of all task updates and project activities for transparent tracking.
Setup Wizard: Onboarding guide to quickly configure the project setup phase.
Founder Guide: Dedicated guidance sections for founders to manage and oversee progress.
Real-time Synchronization: Live data syncing with Supabase for instant status updates and progress animations.
Responsive Design: Modern UI developed with Tailwind CSS compatible with various device screen sizes.
API Integration: Uses Supabase MCP for backend database interactions including real-time subscriptions and updates.
user_flow_summary: User visits the dashboard landing page to observe overall project progress and phase status.
User navigates to specific phase tabs to see detailed task lists, update task statuses (Pending, In Progress, Done), and add notes or blockers.
User uses the Gantt Chart Pro or Kanban Board to manage task dependencies and drag-drop tasks to reflect changes dynamically.
User reviews the Master Map or Timeline View to comprehend task sequencing and dependencies across the project.
User monitors the Activity Logs tab to track real-time updates and execution history.
New users utilize the Setup Wizard for initial onboarding and configuration of project phases and tasks.
Users access the Founder Guide for targeted instructions and best practices on platform usage and project oversight.
validation_criteria: All task and phase data is correctly synced and displayed in real-time without manual refresh.
Task dependency calculations (blockers, predecessors, successors) are accurately reflected in all relevant views (Gantt chart, Kanban, dashboards).
Drag-and-drop and resize functionality in Gantt Chart Pro and Kanban board work smoothly and update underlying data correctly.
Real-time activity logs capture and present all relevant task changes and status updates instantaneously.
Responsive UI works flawlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile browsers.
Supabase backend operations including reading, updating, and subscribing to data tables function without errors.
Setup wizard successfully guides new users through initial project configuration and data seeding.
User interactions such as status changes, notes entry, and blocker assignments persist correctly to the database and reflect immediately in UI.
No significant performance degradation occurs when visualizing large numbers of tasks and dependencies across multiple views.
